title: A new report card, where students, their friends, parents get a say: What has NCERT changed, why
selftext: The Holistic Progress Card, or HPC, will no longer depend on marks or grades to assess a student’s academic performance. Instead, it will rely on a 360-degree evaluation. Here are the details.
comments: Yet another task for the teachers to just get through with
